mapper.select: SELECT BM.COMNAME AS COMNAME ,RECNUM ,REC.COMID AS COMID ,RECTITLE ,SUBTITLE ,REC.BOSS AS BOSS ,GCONTENT ,REG_DATE ,DEADLINE ,SIDO_CODE ,GUGUN_CODE ,CAREER_CODE ,EDU_CODE ,BOOK_COUNT FROM RECRUIT REC LEFT JOIN BUSINESS_MEMBERS BM ON BM.COMID = REC.COMID WHERE REC.COMID = #{comid}
